name: HomeGreeting
0:
”Alexa, ask bouncer Steve to greet our guest”
”Alexa, tell bouncer Steve to greet our guests”
”Alexa, open bouncer Steve and greet our guests”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bouncer steve
des: Use this skill if you don't want to greet a guest yourself. Not only does it greet a guest that enters your home, it reminds them to use the bathroom! Treat your house like an exclusive club with your doorman actually being a bouncer.
